messages.content: A Conservative majority government can get on with the country’s priorities

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Get Brexit done with a deal
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We've got a deal agreed with the EU and It's ready to go. It unlocks a new trade partnership. It protects jobs, food standards, and our precious green environment. And it ends the uncertainty.
To help fund 40 new hospitals and invest in 50,000 new NHS nurses, 6,000 more GPs, CT scanners, and breast-screening machines.
And tougher action on the powers they need to make our streets safer.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More funding for every pupil in every school
keyPolicies.policyDescription: So every child gets a better education, no matter what.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Just a handful of votes could decide this seat. So this election will be very close. And your vote in Putney will make the difference.

issues.brexitEurope: We've got a deal agreed with the EU and It's ready to go. It unlocks a new trade partnership. It protects jobs, food standards, and our precious green environment. And it ends the uncertainty.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school - So every child gets a better education, no matter what.
issues.environment: It protects jobs, food standards, and our precious green environment.
issues.government: Don't risk another hung parliament. Secure the majority government our country needs so we can focus on the NHS, police and schools.
issues.health: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS to help fund 40 new hospitals and invest in 50,000 new NHS nurses, 6,000 more GPs, CT scanners, and breast-screening machines.
issues.lawCrime: 20,000 extra police officers - And tougher action on the powers they need to make our streets safer.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Last time the Conservatives were just nine seats short of a majority. The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance. SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence.

examples: 50,000 new NHS nurses, 6,000 more GPs, CT scanners, and breast-screening machines
Get Brexit done with a deal
tougher action on the powers they need to make our streets safer
So every child gets a better education, no matter what
20,000 extra police officers - And tougher action on the powers they need to make our streets safer.
£33.9 billion extra for the NHS to help fund 40 new hospitals and invest in 50,000 new NHS nurses, 6,000 more GPs, CT scanners, and breast-screening machines.
More funding for every pupil in every school - So every child gets a better education, no matter what.
Get Brexit done with a deal
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance
Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
